title: DJ Premier Joins The Show!
description:
DJ Premier joins Jalen & Jacoby to talk about his latest project Hip Hop 50 celebrating the 50 years of Hip Hop. He also talks about his influence on hip hop and what it was like working with Biggie. Also, Deandre Ayton signs the Indiana Pacers offer, but the Suns were quick to match putting them deep in the luxury tax. Find out what that means for Chris Paul and the Suns and whether Ayton should feel slighted. Also, it’s time to call GM Jalen and make a deal for Kevin Durant. This time it’s the Warriors. Find out who’s in the deal and whether or not Jalen says yes. Plus, shout out Lloyd Banks and Dave East. Listen to find out why. All that and more on Jalen & Jacoby. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
itunes:subtitle: J&J: Deandre Ayton Signs Back With The Suns, DJ Premier Joins The Show
